channel.title: Atualizações ICAM - Destaques
channel.description: Sinopses de artigos científicos produzidas pela equipa ICAM.

item.title: Recomendações práticas para o controlo dos diabetes em doentes com COVID-19
item.description: Practical recommendations for the management of diabetes in patients with COVID-19. Bornstein, et al. The lancet. Diabetes & endocrinology. | 23-Apr-2020

item.title: Comparação de máscaras de tecido e de máscaras cirúrgicas utilizadas por profissionais de saúde
item.description: A cluster randomised trial of cloth masks compared with medical masks in healthcare workers. MacIntyre, et al. BMJ open. | 22-Apr-2015

item.title: Dinâmicas dos anticorpos (Acs) IgM e IgG anti-SARS-CoV-2 em doentes com COVID-19
item.description: Dynamics of anti-SARS-Cov-2 IgM and IgG antibodies among COVID-19 patients. Lee, et al. The Journal of infection. | 23-Apr-2020

item.title: Avaliação dos sintomas oculares e tropismo do SARS CoV-2 em doentes com COVID-19
item.description: Evaluation of ocular symptoms and tropism of SARS-CoV-2 in patients confirmed with COVID-19. Hong, et al. Acta ophthalmologica. | 26-Apr-2020

item.title: Análise aerodinâmica do SARS CoV-2 em dois hospitais de Wuhan
item.description: Aerodynamic analysis of SARS-CoV-2 in two Wuhan hospitals. Liu, et al. Nature. | 27-Apr-2020

item.title: Revisão do tratamento farmacológico para a infeção por SARS-CoV-2
item.description: Pharmacologic Treatments for Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19): A Review. Sanders, et al. JAMA. | 13-Apr-2020

item.title: Transmissão da infeção por SARS-CoV-2 numa unidade de enfermagem especializada
item.description: Presymptomatic SARS-CoV-2 Infections and Transmission in a Skilled Nursing Facility. Arons, et al. The New England journal of medicine. | 24-Apr-2020

item.title: Valor preditivo dos sintomas iniciais para a positividade do teste SARS-CoV-2 entre profissionais de saúde
item.description: Strong associations and moderate predictive value of early symptoms for SARS-CoV-2 test positivity among healthcare workers, the Netherlands, March 2020. Tostmann, et al. Euro surveillance : bulletin Europeen sur les maladies transmissibles = European communicable disease bulletin. | Apr-2020

item.title: Apresentação alternativa de infeção pelo SARS-CoV-2
item.description: Varicella-like exanthem associated with COVID-19 in an 8-year-old girl: A diagnostic clue? Genovese, et al. Pediatric dermatology. | 21-Apr-2020

item.title: Papel do Tocilizumab no tratamento da COVID-19
item.description: Supportive Treatment with Tocilizumab for COVID-19: A Systematic Review. Alzghari and Acuña. Journal of clinical virology : the official publication of the Pan American Society for Clinical Virology. | 21-Apr-2020
